Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.google.mu.safesql.SafeSql.optionally(String, Optional<?>)
    Use SafeSql.of("{foo? -> OR foo?}", optionalFoo) instead of optionally("or {foo}", optionalFoo) because the former allows you to reference foo? multiple times in the right hand side snippet.
    com.google.mu.util.stream.BiIteration.yield(L, R)
    use BiIteration.generate(L, R) instead.
    com.google.mu.util.stream.BiStream.from(Collection<T>, Function<? super T, ? extends K>, Function<? super T, ? extends V>)
    Use biStream(User::id, users) to create BiStream<UserId, User>, or, use biStream(users, User::getAccount) to create BiStream<User, Account>. Then use BiStream.mapKeys(java.util.function.BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends K2>) or BiStream.mapValues(java.util.function.BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends V2>) to apply further mappings.
    com.google.mu.util.stream.BiStream.from(Stream<T>, Function<? super T, ? extends K>, Function<? super T, ? extends V>)
    Use biStream(User::id, users) to create BiStream<UserId, User>, or, use biStream(users, User::getAccount) to create BiStream<User, Account>. Then use BiStream.mapKeys(java.util.function.BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends K2>) or BiStream.mapValues(java.util.function.BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends V2>) to apply further mappings.
    com.google.mu.util.stream.Iteration.yield(T)
    use Iteration.generate(T) instead
    com.google.mu.util.stream.Iteration.yieldAll(Iterable<? extends T>)
    use Iteration.generate(Iterable) instead
